summary: Going alone into an abandoned, living city, a woman tries to cross a forbidden zone swarming with the Morning Patrol and traps. Meeting one of the last city guards, they attempt recall the past and penetrate the zone together.
cast: Michele Valley|Takis Spyridakis|Liana Hatzi|Nikos Hatzis|V. Kabouri|Vicky Kampouri|Takis Loukatos|H. Mavros|Panos Thanassoulis|Rania Trivela
keywords: cyberpunk|female protagonist|male female partnership|global catastrophe|abandoned city
title: Proini peripolos
